player_news.trend_summary: Endrick scored against Real Sociedad in the Copa del Rey semifinal, joining Cristiano Ronaldo in Real Madrid history, but Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti has urged the young player to be patient and accept his bench time as he develops. The eight-goal thriller ended 4-4 (5-4 on aggregate), sending Real Madrid to the Copa del Rey final.

player_news.trend_summary: Anthony Elanga scored a brilliant solo goal for Nottingham Forest against his former club, Manchester United, securing a 1-0 victory. The performance, lauded by his coach and described as the "goal of his life," has ignited dreams of a Champions League berth for Forest while simultaneously drawing criticism of Manchester United's defense.
